questions:

A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Infrastructure and transportation

A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) On a bridge
D) In front of bridge

A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A bridge over a river
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A mountain range
B) A bridge
C) A forest
D) A building

A) A tree
B) A sculpture
C) A bridge
D) A car

B) More bridges and water
C) A city skyline
D) A forest

A) A park
B) A beach
C) A road and ships
D) A playground

A) The bridge is next to the water
B) The bridge is over the water
C) The bridge is under the water
D) The bridge is far from the water

A) Suspension bridge
B) Arch bridge
C) Truss bridge
D) Cable-stayed bridge
